statements.select: SELECT SUPP_ID ,SUPP_Name ,SUPP_Code ,SUPP_Contacter ,SUPP_Tel ,SUPP_Phone ,SUPP_QQ ,SUPP_SettlementMode ,SUPP_SettlementCycle ,SUPP_BankName ,SUPP_BankAccountName ,SUPP_BankAccountNo ,SUPP_MainAutoParts ,SUPP_Addreess ,SUPP_Remark ,SUPP_IsValid ,SUPP_CreatedBy ,SUPP_CreatedTime ,SUPP_UpdatedBy ,SUPP_UpdatedTime ,SUPP_VersionNo ,SUPP_TransID FROM APM_Supplier WHERE SUPP_IsValid=1 AND SUPP_Code=#SUPP_Code# AND SUPP_MerchantCode=#SUPP_MerchantCode#

SELECT APN_ID , APN_Name , APN_Alias , APN_NameSpellCode , APN_AliasSpellCode , APN_APT_ID , APN_SlackDays , APN_UOM , APN_FixUOM , APN_IsSuitableForApp , APN_IsValid , APN_CreatedBy , APN_CreatedTime , APN_UpdatedBy , APN_UpdatedTime , APN_VersionNo , APN_TransID FROM APM_AutoPartsName WHERE APN_IsValid = 1 AND APN_Name = #APN_Name#

SELECT APA_ID , APA_Org_ID , APA_Barcode , APA_OEMNo , APA_Name , APA_Brand , APA_Specification , APA_UOM , APA_Level , APA_VehicleBrand , APA_VehicleInspire , APA_VehicleCapacity , APA_VehicleYearModel , APA_VehicleGearboxType , APA_SUPP_ID , APA_WH_ID , APA_WHB_ID , APA_IsWarningSafeStock , APA_SafeStockNum , APA_IsWarningDeadStock , APA_SlackDays , APA_IsValid , APA_CreatedBy , APA_CreatedTime , APA_UpdatedBy , APA_UpdatedTime , APA_VersionNo , APA_TransID FROM APM_AutoPartsArchive WHERE APA_IsValid = 1 AND APA_Barcode = #APA_Barcode#

DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.SO_ID) FROM SD_SalesOrder T1 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T2 ON T2.Org_ID = T1.SO_Org_ID AND T2.Org_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T31.SOD_SO_ID , T31.SOD_StockInOrgID 'AROrgID' , T31.SOD_StockInOrgCode 'AROrgCode' , T31.SOD_StockInOrgName 'AROrgName' , CASE WHEN ISNULL(T31.SOD_BatchNoNew, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END 'IsPrintBarcode' FROM SD_SalesOrderDetail T31 WHERE T31.SOD_IsValid = 1 ) T3 ON T3.SOD_SO_ID = T1.SO_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T41.ARB_SrcBillNo , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '正向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) END 'AccountReceivableAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '负向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) END 'AccountPayableAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '正向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_ReceivedAmount, 0)) END 'ReceivedAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '负向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_ReceivedAmount, 0)) END 'PaidAmount' FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T41 WHERE T41.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T41.ARB_ApprovalStatusName = '已审核' AND T41.ARB_SourceTypeCode != 'QTYS' GROUP BY T41.ARB_SrcBillNo , T41.ARB_BillDirectName ) T4 ON T4.ARB_SrcBillNo = T1.SO_No INNER JOIN ( SELECT T51.AFC_ID 'CustomerID' , '平台内汽修商' 'CustomerType' , T51.AFC_Code 'AutoFactoryCode' , T51.AFC_Name 'AutoFactoryName' , T51.AFC_AROrg_Phone 'CustomerPhoneNo' , T51.AFC_CreditAmount 'CreditAmount', T51.AFC_AutoPartsPriceType 'AutoPartsPriceType' FROM PIS_AutoFactoryCustomer T51 WHERE T51.AFC_IsValid = 1 AND T51.AFC_IsPlatform = 1 ) T5 ON T5.CustomerType = T1.SO_CustomerTypeName AND T5.CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T61.ARB_Org_ID , T61.ARB_PayObjectID , SUM(ISNULL(T61.ARB_UnReceiveAmount, 0)) 'DebtAmount' FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T61 WHERE T61.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T61.ARB_ApprovalStatusName = '已审核' AND '执行中;已对账;' LIKE '%'+T61.ARB_BusinessStatusName+';%' GROUP BY T61.ARB_Org_ID , T61.ARB_PayObjectID ) T6 ON T6.ARB_Org_ID = T1.SO_Org_ID AND T6.ARB_PayObjectID = T1.SO_CustomerID LEFT JOIN EWM_Wallet T7 ON T7.Wal_CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID AND T7.Wal_IsValid = 1 AND T7.Wal_AutoFactoryCode = ( CASE WHEN T1.SO_CustomerTypeName = '平台内汽修商' THEN T5.AutoFactoryCode ELSE T7.Wal_AutoFactoryCode END ) AND T7.Wal_AutoFactoryOrgCode = ( CASE WHEN T1.SO_CustomerTypeName = '平台内汽修商' THEN T3.AROrgCode ELSE T7.Wal_AutoFactoryOrgCode END ) WHERE '主动销售;销售预测;' LIKE '%' + T1.SO_SourceTypeName + ';%'
T1.SO_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_No#+'%'
T1.SO_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.SO_SourceTypeName =#WHERE_SO_SourceTypeName#
T5.AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
T1.SO_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_CustomerName#+'%'
T1.SO_StatusName =#WHERE_SO_StatusName#
T1.SO_ApprovalStatusName =#WHERE_SO_ApprovalStatusName#
T1.SO_IsPriceIncludeTax=#WHERE_SO_IsPriceIncludeTax#
T1.SO_IsValid=#WHERE_SO_IsValid#
T1.SO_CreatedTime BETWEEN #_CreatedTimeStart# AND #_CreatedTimeEnd# T1.SO_CreatedTime >= #_CreatedTimeStart#
T1.SO_CreatedTime <= #_CreatedTimeEnd#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , 1 'OrderIndex' , 0 'IsChecked' , T1.SO_ID , T1.SO_No , T1.SO_Org_ID , T1.SO_SourceTypeCode , T1.SO_SourceTypeName , T1.SO_SourceNo , T1.SO_CustomerID , T1.SO_CustomerTypeCode , T1.SO_CustomerTypeName , T1.SO_CustomerName , T1.SO_IsPriceIncludeTax , T1.SO_TaxRate , T1.SO_TotalTax , T1.SO_TotalAmount , T1.SO_TotalNetAmount , T1.SO_StatusCode , T1.SO_StatusName , T1.SO_ApprovalStatusCode , T1.SO_ApprovalStatusName , T1.SO_AutoPartsPriceType , T1.SO_SalesByID , T1.SO_SalesByName , T1.SO_Remark , T1.SO_IsValid , T1.SO_CreatedBy , T1.SO_CreatedTime , T1.SO_UpdatedBy , T1.SO_UpdatedTime , T1.SO_VersionNo , T2.Org_ShortName , T3.AROrgID , T3.AROrgCode , T3.AROrgName , T3.IsPrintBarcode , T4.AccountReceivableAmount , T4.ReceivedAmount , ISNULL(T4.AccountReceivableAmount, 0) - ISNULL(T4.ReceivedAmount, 0) 'UnReceiveAmount' , T4.AccountPayableAmount , T4.PaidAmount , ISNULL(T4.AccountPayableAmount, 0) - ISNULL(T4.PaidAmount, 0) 'UnPaidAmount' , T5.AutoFactoryCode , T5.AutoFactoryName , T5.CustomerPhoneNo , T5.CreditAmount , T5.AutoPartsPriceType , T6.DebtAmount , T7.Wal_No , T7.Wal_AvailableBalance FROM SD_SalesOrder T1 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T2 ON T2.Org_ID = T1.SO_Org_ID AND T2.Org_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T31.SOD_SO_ID , T31.SOD_StockInOrgID 'AROrgID' , T31.SOD_StockInOrgCode 'AROrgCode' , T31.SOD_StockInOrgName 'AROrgName' , CASE WHEN ISNULL(T31.SOD_BatchNoNew, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END 'IsPrintBarcode' FROM SD_SalesOrderDetail T31 WHERE T31.SOD_IsValid = 1 ) T3 ON T3.SOD_SO_ID = T1.SO_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T41.ARB_SrcBillNo , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '正向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) END 'AccountReceivableAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '负向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) END 'AccountPayableAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '正向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_ReceivedAmount, 0)) END 'ReceivedAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '负向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_ReceivedAmount, 0)) END 'PaidAmount' FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T41 WHERE T41.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T41.ARB_ApprovalStatusName = '已审核' AND T41.ARB_SourceTypeCode != 'QTYS' GROUP BY T41.ARB_SrcBillNo , T41.ARB_BillDirectName ) T4 ON T4.ARB_SrcBillNo = T1.SO_No INNER JOIN ( SELECT T51.AFC_ID 'CustomerID' , '平台内汽修商' 'CustomerType' , T51.AFC_Code 'AutoFactoryCode' , T51.AFC_Name 'AutoFactoryName' , T51.AFC_AROrg_Phone 'CustomerPhoneNo' , T51.AFC_CreditAmount 'CreditAmount', T51.AFC_AutoPartsPriceType 'AutoPartsPriceType' FROM PIS_AutoFactoryCustomer T51 WHERE T51.AFC_IsValid = 1 AND T51.AFC_IsPlatform = 1 ) T5 ON T5.CustomerType = T1.SO_CustomerTypeName AND T5.CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID LEFT JOIN (SELECT T61.ARB_Org_ID , T61.ARB_PayObjectID , SUM(ISNULL(T61.ARB_UnReceiveAmount, 0)) 'DebtAmount' FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T61 WHERE T61.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T61.ARB_ApprovalStatusName = '已审核' AND '执行中;已对账;' LIKE '%'+T61.ARB_BusinessStatusName+';%' GROUP BY T61.ARB_Org_ID , T61.ARB_PayObjectID ) T6 ON T6.ARB_Org_ID = T1.SO_Org_ID AND T6.ARB_PayObjectID = T1.SO_CustomerID LEFT JOIN EWM_Wallet T7 ON T7.Wal_CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID AND T7.Wal_IsValid = 1 AND T7.Wal_AutoFactoryCode = ( CASE WHEN T1.SO_CustomerTypeName = '平台内汽修商' THEN T5.AutoFactoryCode ELSE T7.Wal_AutoFactoryCode END ) AND T7.Wal_AutoFactoryOrgCode = ( CASE WHEN T1.SO_CustomerTypeName = '平台内汽修商' THEN T3.AROrgCode ELSE T7.Wal_AutoFactoryOrgCode END ) WHERE '主动销售;销售预测;' LIKE '%' + T1.SO_SourceTypeName + ';%'
T1.SO_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_No#+'%'
T1.SO_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.SO_SourceTypeName =#WHERE_SO_SourceTypeName#
T5.AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
T1.SO_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_CustomerName#+'%'
T1.SO_StatusName =#WHERE_SO_StatusName#
T1.SO_ApprovalStatusName =#WHERE_SO_ApprovalStatusName#
T1.SO_IsPriceIncludeTax=#WHERE_SO_IsPriceIncludeTax#
T1.SO_IsValid=#WHERE_SO_IsValid#
T1.SO_CreatedTime BETWEEN #_CreatedTimeStart# AND #_CreatedTimeEnd# T1.SO_CreatedTime >= #_CreatedTimeStart#
T1.SO_CreatedTime <= #_CreatedTimeEnd#
UNION SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , 2 'OrderIndex' , NULL 'IsChecked' , NULL 'SO_ID' , NULL 'SO_No' , NULL 'SO_Org_ID' , NULL 'SO_SourceTypeCode' , NULL 'SO_SourceTypeName' , NULL 'SO_SourceNo' , NULL 'SO_CustomerID' , NULL 'SO_CustomerTypeCode' , NULL 'SO_CustomerTypeName' , ' 合计：' 'SO_CustomerName' , NULL 'SO_IsPriceIncludeTax' , NULL 'SO_TaxRate' , NULL 'SO_TotalTax' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.SO_TotalAmount, 0)) 'SO_TotalAmount' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.SO_TotalNetAmount, 0)) 'SO_TotalNetAmount' , NULL 'SO_StatusCode' , NULL 'SO_StatusName' , NULL 'SO_ApprovalStatusCode' , NULL 'SO_ApprovalStatusName' , NULL 'SO_AutoPartsPriceType' , NULL 'SO_SalesByID' , NULL 'SO_SalesByName' , NULL 'SO_Remark' , NULL 'SO_IsValid' , NULL 'SO_CreatedBy' , NULL 'SO_CreatedTime' , NULL 'SO_UpdatedBy' , NULL 'SO_UpdatedTime' , NULL 'SO_VersionNo' , NULL 'Org_ShortName' , NULL 'AROrgID' , NULL 'AROrgCode' , NULL 'AROrgName' , NULL 'IsPrintBarcode' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) 'AccountReceivableAmount' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.ReceivedAmount, 0)) 'ReceivedAmount' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.UnReceiveAmount, 0)) 'UnReceiveAmount' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.AccountPayableAmount, 0)) 'AccountPayableAmount' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.PaidAmount, 0)) 'PaidAmount' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.UnPaidAmount, 0)) 'UnPaidAmount' , NULL 'AutoFactoryCode' , NULL 'AutoFactoryName' , NULL 'CustomerPhoneNo' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.CreditAmount, 0)) 'CreditAmount' , NULL 'AutoPartsPriceType' , SUM(ISNULL(Temp.DebtAmount, 0)) 'DebtAmount' , NULL 'Wal_No' , NULL 'Wal_AvailableBalance' FROM ( SELECT T1.SO_TotalAmount , T1.SO_TotalNetAmount , T4.AccountReceivableAmount , T4.ReceivedAmount , ISNULL(T4.AccountReceivableAmount, 0) - ISNULL(T4.ReceivedAmount, 0) 'UnReceiveAmount' , T4.AccountPayableAmount , T4.PaidAmount , ISNULL(T4.AccountPayableAmount, 0) - ISNULL(T4.PaidAmount, 0) 'UnPaidAmount' , T5.CreditAmount , T6.DebtAmount FROM SD_SalesOrder T1 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T2 ON T2.Org_ID = T1.SO_Org_ID AND T2.Org_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T31.SOD_SO_ID , T31.SOD_StockInOrgID 'AROrgID' , T31.SOD_StockInOrgCode 'AROrgCode' , T31.SOD_StockInOrgName 'AROrgName' , CASE WHEN ISNULL(T31.SOD_BatchNoNew, '') = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END 'IsPrintBarcode' FROM SD_SalesOrderDetail T31 WHERE T31.SOD_IsValid = 1 ) T3 ON T3.SOD_SO_ID = T1.SO_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T41.ARB_SrcBillNo , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '正向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) END 'AccountReceivableAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '负向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) END 'AccountPayableAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '正向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_ReceivedAmount, 0)) END 'ReceivedAmount' , CASE WHEN T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '负向' THEN SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_ReceivedAmount, 0)) END 'PaidAmount' FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T41 WHERE T41.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T41.ARB_ApprovalStatusName = '已审核' AND T41.ARB_SourceTypeCode != 'QTYS' GROUP BY T41.ARB_SrcBillNo , T41.ARB_BillDirectName ) T4 ON T4.ARB_SrcBillNo = T1.SO_No INNER JOIN ( SELECT T51.AFC_ID 'CustomerID' , '平台内汽修商' 'CustomerType' , T51.AFC_Code 'AutoFactoryCode' , T51.AFC_Name 'AutoFactoryName' , T51.AFC_AROrg_Phone 'CustomerPhoneNo' , T51.AFC_CreditAmount 'CreditAmount', T51.AFC_AutoPartsPriceType 'AutoPartsPriceType' FROM PIS_AutoFactoryCustomer T51 WHERE T51.AFC_IsValid = 1 AND T51.AFC_IsPlatform = 1 ) T5 ON T5.CustomerType = T1.SO_CustomerTypeName AND T5.CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T61.ARB_Org_ID , T61.ARB_PayObjectID , SUM(ISNULL(T61.ARB_UnReceiveAmount, 0)) 'DebtAmount' FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T61 WHERE T61.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T61.ARB_ApprovalStatusName = '已审核' AND '执行中;已对账;' LIKE '%'+T61.ARB_BusinessStatusName+';%' GROUP BY T61.ARB_Org_ID , T61.ARB_PayObjectID ) T6 ON T6.ARB_Org_ID = T1.SO_Org_ID AND T6.ARB_PayObjectID = T1.SO_CustomerID LEFT JOIN EWM_Wallet T7 ON T7.Wal_CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID AND T7.Wal_IsValid = 1 AND T7.Wal_AutoFactoryCode = ( CASE WHEN T1.SO_CustomerTypeName = '平台内汽修商' THEN T5.AutoFactoryCode ELSE T7.Wal_AutoFactoryCode END ) AND T7.Wal_AutoFactoryOrgCode = ( CASE WHEN T1.SO_CustomerTypeName = '平台内汽修商' THEN T3.AROrgCode ELSE T7.Wal_AutoFactoryOrgCode END ) WHERE '主动销售;销售预测;' LIKE '%' + T1.SO_SourceTypeName + ';%'
T1.SO_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_No#+'%'
T1.SO_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.SO_SourceTypeName =#WHERE_SO_SourceTypeName#
T5.AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
T1.SO_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_CustomerName#+'%'
T1.SO_StatusName =#WHERE_SO_StatusName#
T1.SO_ApprovalStatusName =#WHERE_SO_ApprovalStatusName#
T1.SO_IsPriceIncludeTax=#WHERE_SO_IsPriceIncludeTax#
T1.SO_IsValid=#WHERE_SO_IsValid#
T1.SO_CreatedTime BETWEEN #_CreatedTimeStart# AND #_CreatedTimeEnd# T1.SO_CreatedTime >= #_CreatedTimeStart#
T1.SO_CreatedTime <= #_CreatedTimeEnd#
) Temp
ORDER BY T1.SO_CreatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY

SELECT T1.PO_ID , T1.PO_No , T1.PO_Org_ID , T1.PO_ARVPB_No , T1.PO_PlateNumber , T1.PO_VIN , T1.PO_EngineNo , T1.PO_Amount , T1.PO_Status , T1.PO_ReceivedTime , T1.PO_IsValid , T1.PO_CreatedBy , T1.PO_CreatedTime , T1.PO_UpdatedBy , T1.PO_UpdatedTime , T1.PO_VersionNo , T1.PO_TransID , T1.PO_LogisticFee , T1.PO_SourceType FROM APM_PurchaseOrder T1 WHERE T1.PO_SourceType = #PO_SourceType# AND T1.PO_Org_ID = #PO_Org_ID# AND T1.PO_No = #PO_No# AND T1.PO_IsValid = 1

SELECT T1.POD_ID , T1.POD_PO_No , T1.POD_AutoPartsBarcode , T1.POD_AutoPartsBatchNo , T1.POD_ThirdCode , T1.POD_OEMCode , T1.POD_AutoPartsName , T1.POD_AutoPartsBrand , T1.POD_AutoPartsSpec , T1.POD_AutoPartsLevel , T1.POD_UOM , T1.POD_VehicleBrand , T1.POD_VehicleInspire , T1.POD_VehicleCapacity , T1.POD_VehicleYearModel , T1.POD_VehicleGearboxType , T1.POD_SUPP_MerchantCode , T1.POD_SUPP_MerchantName , T1.POD_SUPP_ID , T1.POD_WH_ID , T1.POD_WHB_ID , T1.POD_OrderQuantity , T1.POD_ReceivedQuantity , T1.POD_UnitPrice , T1.POD_Status , T1.POD_ReceivedTime , T1.POD_IsValid , T1.POD_CreatedBy , T1.POD_CreatedTime , T1.POD_UpdatedBy , T1.POD_UpdatedTime , T1.POD_VersionNo , T1.POD_TransID FROM APM_PurchaseOrderDetail T1 WHERE T1.POD_PO_No = #POD_PO_No# AND T1.POD_IsValid = 1
statements.delete:
BEGIN TRY
IF EXISTS ( SELECT PO_ID FROM APM_PurchaseOrder WHERE PO_ID = #PO_ID# ) BEGIN DELETE FROM APM_PurchaseOrder WHERE PO_ID = #PO_ID# END SELECT 1
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT 0
END CATCH

BEGIN TRY
IF EXISTS ( SELECT POD_ID FROM APM_PurchaseOrderDetail WHERE POD_ID = #POD_ID# ) BEGIN DELETE FROM APM_PurchaseOrderDetail WHERE POD_ID = #POD_ID# END SELECT 1
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT 0
END CATCH
statements.select: SELECT T1.SOBD_ID , T1.SOBD_SOB_ID , T1.SOBD_SOB_No , T1.SOBD_SourceDetailID , T1.SOBD_Barcode 'INV_Barcode' , T1.SOBD_BatchNo 'INV_BatchNo' , T1.SOBD_ThirdNo 'INV_ThirdNo' , T1.SOBD_OEMNo 'INV_OEMNo' , T1.SOBD_Name 'INV_Name' , T1.SOBD_Specification 'INV_Specification' , T1.SOBD_WH_ID 'INV_WH_ID' , T1.SOBD_WHB_ID 'INV_WHB_ID' , T1.SOBD_UnitCostPrice 'INV_PurchaseUnitPrice' , T1.SOBD_Qty 'StockOutQty' , T1.SOBD_UOM , T1.SOBD_UnitSalePrice , T1.SOBD_Amount , T4.WH_Name , T5.WHB_Name , T6.INV_Qty, T6.INV_SUPP_ID, T7.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_StockOutBillDetail T1 INNER JOIN PIS_StockOutBill T2 ON T2.SOB_ID = T1.SOBD_SOB_ID AND T2.SOB_No = T1.SOBD_SOB_No AND T2.SOB_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN SD_SalesOrder T3 ON T3.SO_No = T2.SOB_SourceNo AND T3.SO_No = #WHERE_SO_No# LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T4 ON T4.WH_ID = T1.SOBD_WH_ID AND T4.WH_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_WarehouseBin T5 ON T5.WHB_ID = T1.SOBD_WHB_ID AND T5.WHB_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN PIS_Inventory T6 ON T6.INV_Org_ID = T2.SOB_Org_ID AND T6.INV_Barcode = T1.SOBD_Barcode AND T6.INV_BatchNo = T1.SOBD_BatchNo AND T6.INV_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Supplier T7 ON T7.SUPP_ID = T6.INV_SUPP_ID AND T7.SUPP_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.SOBD_IsValid = 1
SELECT COUNT(T1.CT_ID) FROM SCON_CodeTable T1 WHERE T1.CT_IsValid = 1 AND T1.CT_Type = #WHERE_CT_Type# AND T1.CT_Name = #WHERE_CT_Name#
SELECT COUNT(T1.APT_ID) FROM APM_AutoPartsType T1 WHERE T1.APT_IsValid = 1 AND T1.APT_Name = #WHERE_APT_Name#

SELECT T1.SN_ID , T1.SN_ER_ID , T1.SN_Value , T1.SN_Status , T1.SN_IsValid , T1.SN_CreatedBy , T1.SN_CreatedTime , T1.SN_UpdatedBy , T1.SN_UpdatedTime , T1.SN_VersionNo , T1.SN_TransID FROM SM_SystemNo T1 WHERE T1.SN_IsValid = 1 AND T1.SN_Value = #WHERE_SN_Value#
statements.delete:
BEGIN TRY
IF EXISTS ( SELECT SN_ID FROM SM_SystemNo WHERE SN_Value = #WHERE_SN_Value# ) BEGIN DELETE FROM SM_SystemNo WHERE SN_Value = #WHERE_SN_Value# END SELECT 1
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT 0
END CATCH
statements.update:
UPDATE SD_SalesOrder SET SO_SourceNo = #SO_SourceNo#, SO_UpdatedTime=GETDATE(), SO_VersionNo=SO_VersionNo+1 SO_No=#SO_No# SO_Org_ID=#SO_Org_ID# SO_SourceTypeCode=#SO_SourceTypeCode# SO_SourceTypeName=#SO_SourceTypeName# SO_CustomerTypeCode=#SO_CustomerTypeCode# SO_CustomerTypeName=#SO_CustomerTypeName# SO_CustomerID=#SO_CustomerID# SO_CustomerName=#SO_CustomerName# SO_IsPriceIncludeTax=#SO_IsPriceIncludeTax# SO_TaxRate=#SO_TaxRate# SO_TotalTax=#SO_TotalTax# SO_TotalAmount=#SO_TotalAmount# SO_TotalNetAmount=#SO_TotalNetAmount# SO_StatusCode=#SO_StatusCode# SO_StatusName=#SO_StatusName# SO_ApprovalStatusCode=#SO_ApprovalStatusCode# SO_ApprovalStatusName=#SO_ApprovalStatusName# SO_AutoPartsPriceType=#SO_AutoPartsPriceType# SO_SalesByID=#SO_SalesByID# SO_SalesByName=#SO_SalesByName# SO_Remark=#SO_Remark# SO_IsValid=#SO_IsValid# SO_CreatedBy=#SO_CreatedBy# SO_CreatedTime=#SO_CreatedTime# SO_UpdatedBy=#SO_UpdatedBy# SO_TransID=#SO_TransID# WHERE 1 = 1
SO_ID=#WHERE_SO_ID#

UPDATE SD_SalesOrderDetail SET SOD_BatchNoNew = '' , SOD_UpdatedTime = GETDATE() , SOD_VersionNo = SOD_VersionNo + 1 SOD_SO_ID=#SOD_SO_ID# SOD_SalePriceRate=#SOD_SalePriceRate# SOD_SalePriceRateIsChangeable=#SOD_SalePriceRateIsChangeable# SOD_PriceIsIncludeTax=#SOD_PriceIsIncludeTax# SOD_TaxRate=#SOD_TaxRate# SOD_TotalTax=#SOD_TotalTax# SOD_Qty=#SOD_Qty# SOD_SignQty=#SOD_SignQty# SOD_RejectQty=#SOD_RejectQty# SOD_LoseQty=#SOD_LoseQty# SOD_UnitPrice=#SOD_UnitPrice# SOD_TotalAmount=#SOD_TotalAmount# SOD_Barcode=#SOD_Barcode# SOD_BatchNo=#SOD_BatchNo# SOD_Name=#SOD_Name# SOD_Specification=#SOD_Specification# SOD_UOM=#SOD_UOM# SOD_StockInOrgID=#SOD_StockInOrgID# SOD_StockInOrgName=#SOD_StockInOrgName# SOD_StockInWarehouseID=#SOD_StockInWarehouseID# SOD_StockInWarehouseName=#SOD_StockInWarehouseName# SOD_StockInBinID=#SOD_StockInBinID# SOD_StockInBinName=#SOD_StockInBinName# SOD_StatusCode=#SOD_StatusCode# SOD_StatusName=#SOD_StatusName# SOD_ApprovalStatusCode=#SOD_ApprovalStatusCode# SOD_ApprovalStatusName=#SOD_ApprovalStatusName# SOD_Remark=#SOD_Remark# SOD_IsValid=#SOD_IsValid# SOD_CreatedBy=#SOD_CreatedBy# SOD_CreatedTime=#SOD_CreatedTime# SOD_UpdatedBy=#SOD_UpdatedBy# SOD_TransID=#SOD_TransID# WHERE 1 = 1
SOD_ID=#WHERE_SOD_ID#
SOD_VersionNo=#WHERE_SOD_VersionNo#
statements.select: SELECT T1.VBIS_Brand , T1.VBIS_Inspire FROM BS_VehicleBrandInspireSumma T1 WHERE T1.VBIS_IsValid = 1 AND #WHERE_VBIS_Brand# LIKE '%' + T1.VBIS_Brand + ';%' AND #WHERE_VBIS_Inspire# LIKE '%' + T1.VBIS_Inspire + ';%'

SELECT T1.APN_ID , T1.APN_Name , T1.APN_Alias , T1.APN_NameSpellCode , T1.APN_AliasSpellCode , T1.APN_APT_ID , T1.APN_SlackDays , T1.APN_UOM , T1.APN_FixUOM , T1.APN_IsValid , T1.APN_CreatedBy , T1.APN_CreatedTime , T1.APN_UpdatedBy , T1.APN_UpdatedTime , T1.APN_VersionNo , t2.APT_Name 'APT_Name' FROM BS_AutoPartsName T1 LEFT JOIN BS_AutoPartsType T2 ON T2.APT_ID=T1.APN_APT_ID WHERE T1.APN_Name=#WHERE_APN_Name# AND T1.APN_IsValid=#WHERE_APN_IsValid#
